title: Beginning Deno Development
description: In this book, we take you on a fun, hands-on and pragmatic journey to learning Deno development. You'll start building your first Deno app within minutes. Every chapter is written in a bite-sized manner and straight to the point as I don't want to waste your time (and most certainly mine) on the content you don't need. In the end, you will have the skills to create a Deno web app and a Deno REST API.
